item.description:
The Professionals of Color Business and Social Network invites you to it's bi-monthly networking event at 33 Restaurant and Lounge.


Thursday, September 18, 2008


33 Restaurant & Lounge - 33 Stanhope Street



"Tell Me About Yourself (in 30-seconds or less!)" Workshop

Have you ever faced the dreaded "Tell Me About Yourself" statement at a networking event or during an interview? You may have only 30 seconds to get your target's attention and make a lasting impression!


In this workshop, we will share the 30-second "intro-mercial" guidelines of networking experts and give networkers a chance to create their personal introduction. Then, we will have volunteers stand up and give their 30-second personal introduction to the group and receive feedback.


Don't miss this opportunity to develop one of your most vital networking skills!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Red Name Badge
item.name: Monthly After Work Mixer
